meaningMnemonic:
Remember how 管理 is "management"? Well, a management person is someone who manages a place, like the <vocabulary>superintendent</vocabulary> for a building or park, or the <vocabulary>administrator</vocabulary> of a website. 

It can also refer to someone who is appointed to manage an estate, like a property <vocabulary>custodian</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
